OOC: Most of my attacks I cleared with Yanshosh before I started its not 
that I have new powers. I just didn't show off by using them all right at 
the start. As for the attack post it lacked basic logic Number 1 a lance 
distance is at max 6ft a Missile Blast Raduis is about 10ft and lets not say 
what a grenades is. So unless you threw the lance at my throat your in your 
own blast zone and if memory is running right all your fighters behind me 
shot exploding or spread radius weapons((Fireballs)) so there is back blast. 
So when Koj cut off his thrusters and dropped there attacks weren't seekers 
so the would have continued straight at Prebon sense you stationed him in 
front Koj.

                             ::Weapons School::
Also a lance thrust like that is sloppy at close range lances are staff type 
weapons and easy to parry by a well prepared fighter or one in a ((Defensive 
stance)) if not handled better or with more Knowledge of Lancer tactics. A 
thrust like the type you used would only be effective in a rushing attack by 
you or if your enemy charged you. Lances are more skill type weapons than 
sword slash and gash weapons that why Koj fighters like a dancer with the 
Fang. ((This is not trying to be a smart ass or pick a fight but just basic 
combat and tactics.))
